author: Jenni Fink
title: Is It Safe to Get My Mail During Coronavirus Pandemic?
description: Although the virus can survive on surfaces for a few days, officials aren't recommending that people avoid bringing packages inside.
content:
Officials are urging people to do their part to stop the spread of the new coronavirus, but so far there are no indications that it's time to stop checking mailboxes or bringing packages inside.
